name: Newtonian
description: Kudos! You've won a bronze badge in this challenge. Keep up the great work!
code:
challenge_round = ChallengeRound.find_by(id:round_id)
round_name = challenge_round.challenge.challenge + ' ' + challenge_round.challenge_round
if max_rank <= 250
  if participant_ranks>=0.2 && participant_ranks < 0.4
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('gold-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
elsif max_rank > 250
  if participant_ranks >=0.05 && participant_ranks < 0.1
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('gold-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
end

name: test_badge
description: test

name: Rookie
description: You've made your first successful submission with us. Keep going!
code:
if Submission.where(participant_id: participant_id, grading_status_cd: 'graded').count == 1
  Participant.find_by(id: participant_id)&.add_badge("Learner")
end

name: Enduring
description: You've made more than 10 submissions. Here's a bronze badge for you!
code:
if grading_status_cd == 'graded'
  participant_submission_count = Submission.where(participant_id: participant_id, grading_status_cd: 'graded').count
  if participant_submission_count == 10
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge("bronze-submitter")
  end
end

name: Beginner
description: You've made your first submission with us. Keep the learning coming in!
code:
if Submission.where(participant_id: participant_id).count == 1
  Participant.find_by(id: participant_id)&.add_badge("Beginner")

name: BeastMode
description: Wow! You've made over 1000 successful submissions. Here's a gold badge for you. Keep going!
code:
if grading_status_cd == 'graded'
  participant_submission_count = Submission.where(participant_id: participant_id, grading_status_cd: 'graded').count
  if participant_submission_count == 1000
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge("gold-submitter")
  end
end

name: Persistant
description: Great work! You've made more than 100 successful submissions. Here's a silver badge for you.
code:
if grading_status_cd == 'graded'
  participant_submission_count = Submission.where(participant_id: participant_id, grading_status_cd: 'graded').count
  if participant_submission_count == 100
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge("silver-submitter")
  end
end

name: Boltzmann's Favourite
description: Kudos! You've been awarded a silver badge for this challenge. Keep up the great work!
code:
challenge_round = ChallengeRound.find_by(id:round_id)
round_name = challenge_round.challenge.challenge + ' ' + challenge_round.challenge_round

if max_rank <= 250
  if participant_ranks>=0.1 && participant_ranks < 0.2
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('silver-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
elsif max_rank > 250
  if participant_ranks >= 0.01 && participant_ranks < 0.05
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('silver-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
end

name: EulerLearner
description: Great work! You're one of the top participants in this challenge. Here's a gold badge to celebrate the acheivement.
code:
challenge_round = ChallengeRound.find_by(id:round_id)
round_name = challenge_round.challenge.challenge + ' ' + challenge_round.challenge_round
if max_rank <= 250
  if participant_ranks < 0.1
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('bronze-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
elsif max_rank > 250
  if participant_ranks < 0.01
    Participant.find_by(id: participant_id).add_badge('bronze-challenge-end', {challenge_round: round_name})
  end
end
